attributes.action: abandon TV licence or let us have a choice whether or not to watch BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am so frustrated that BBC regularly criticises the government, yet we are forced to pay TV licence to fund this activity. I would like to have a choice and freedom, so I can decide whether to pay TV licence to watch BBC or not to pay and not watch BBC. Also, more publicity is needed to inform the licence payer about what they are actually paying for and why it is imposed on them.
